thread.title: Pornhub Wants to Teach You About Sexual Health
thread.title_full: Pornhub Wants to Teach You About Sexual Health

author: ahrustic1
title: Pornhub Wants to Teach You About Sexual Health
text:
Your Privacy Rights Canadian Customers 
In an effort to give you the sexual education you’ve always wanted (and needed), Pornhub is officially launching the Pornhub Sexual Wellness Center , your new go-to destination for all things sexual safety, STIs, and relationship advice. The goal: to teach you everything you should know about love, sex, and intimacy that you can’t learn from porn . The adult entertainment site has partnered with clinical psychologist Laurie Betito, Ph.D., who will direct the center and answer all of your awkward, uncomfortable, and curious sex questions, reports Mashable . 
“Our goal is to provide our visitors with a site that has credible and insightful information, rather than have them scouring the Internet,” Corey Price, vice president of Pornhub, told Mashable . Advertisement
